name: The Clozet Company Co., Ltd.
description: Developer of an online renting platform designed to offer high-end luxury bags and clothes. The company's platform offers bags, clutches, dresses, skirts, and other women's accessories for a short time, enabling customers to try new fashion on different occasions without paying the full price for it.
one_liner: Developer of an online renting platform designed to offer high-end luxury bags and clothes. The company's platform offers bags, clutches, dresses, skirts, and other women's accessories for a short time, enabling customers to try new fashion on different occasions without paying the full price for it.
